moves.name: X Attack
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Hang in There!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def by 1 stat rank. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting paralyzed.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Recuperation 1
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP after using its sync move.
